description: This record covers single maps of Alaska as a whole covering various subjects, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps and photocopies of printed or manuscript single maps and may also include some multi-sheet single maps, plates from atlases, books or periodicals, and printed facsimiles. These maps show various subjects, including forests and forestry, geology, and glaciers. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. If a map in this collection may be in copyright, there is no online image available. LC Trails, 4, 6, 232, 248, 257, 275, 276 Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Drawers 11-19

medium: 9 drawers of maps : some color, some photocopies ; various sizes.
